actions.description: The gnoll makes two Bite, Spear, or Longbow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.name: Spear

actions.description: 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Longbow
